item.title: Tommy Snebachs Nisseband - Jingle Bells
item.description:
Ukulele play along of Jingle Bells
A nice easy version, ideal for beginners.
Using the chords: C F G7 D7
Strum Pattern: Various eg. D D D D or DU D DU D
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended
Notes: You can substitute D7 for a D chord if you wish, I'm trying to keep it simple. When playing D7 try using 2nd and 3rd fingers for an easier chord change, the chord font is suggesting 1st & 2nd.
